entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is described as having wide red eyes that are still shocked. He had no more expected this than Harry had.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric's shade stood up and looked around, speaking to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as looking at Voldemort and hearing the frightened yells of the Death Eaters.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The Death Eaters are described as prowling around the edges of the golden dome, yelling in fright.

relationships.description: Voldemort and Harry both had no more expected this.
